pandas
xgboost



RUN pip install --quiet --yes --no-cache-dir \
	'pandas=0.17*' \
	'matplotlib=1.5*' \
	'seaborn=0.7*' \
	'graphviz=2.38.*' \
	'scikit-learn=0.17*'



RUN git clone --recursive https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost && \
    cd xgboost && \
    make -j4 && \
	cd python-package; python3 setup.py install



RUN curl -O https://repo.continuum.io/archive/Anaconda3-4.2.0-Linux-x86_64.sh
RUN sha256sum Anaconda3-4.2.0-Linux-x86_64.sh
RUN bash Anaconda3-4.2.0-Linux-x86_64.sh

RUN conda install --quiet --yes \
	'numpy‑1.13.1+mkl‑cp34‑cp34m‑win_amd64.whl' \
	'pandas==0.19.2' \
	'matplotlib==2.0.2' \
	'seaborn==0.7.1' \
	'graphviz==0.5.2' \
	'scikit-learn==0.18.2' 

RUN echo 'export PATH=/opt/conda/bin:$PATH' > /etc/profile.d/conda.sh && \
    wget --quiet https://repo.continuum.io/archive/Anaconda2-4.4.0-Linux-x86_64.sh -O ~/anaconda.sh && \
    /bin/bash ~/anaconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda && \
	rm ~/anaconda.sh

/*# sourceMappingURL=bootstrap.min.css.map */
